Ajay Devgn Thanks Cricketer Krunal Pandya For Birthday Wishes, Suggests They Should Do A Double-Role Film
Ajay Devgn Thanks Cricketer Krunal Pandya For Birthday Wishes, Suggests They Should Do A Double-Role Film
Bollywood actor Ajay Devgn recently celebrated his 50th birthday on Tuesday. From his fans to family, everyone wished the popular actor on social media. One person whose birthday wishes stood out was Mumbai Indians cricketer Krunal Pandya.
Twitter
You must be wondering what makes his wish any different. Well, apart from being a talented young cricketer, Krunal also looks like Ajay Devgn. Yes, it won't be wrong to say he's Ajay Devgn's doppelganger.
So when the all rounder shared a picture of himself with the birthday boy, "Singham, Superstar and my doppelganger. Happy birthday to one of my favourite actors @ajaydevgn #HappyBirthdayAjayDevgn", Ajay Devgn had a snazzy comeback.
Thanks Krunal.. Ek double role ki film saath mein karte hain! 😜 https://t.co/VS6UP17Gn0 — Ajay Devgn (@ajaydevgn) April 3, 2019
Don't Miss 862 SHARES 346 SHARES 183 SHARES
Ajay Devgn replied, "Thanks Krunal.. Ek double role ki film saath mein karte hain!" Infact, once a West Indies cricketer Kieron Pollard even asked Krunal if Ajay Devgn was his real dad.
Youtube/Screengrab
On the work front, Krunal is busy with IPL playing for his beloved team while Ajay Devgn is gearing up to promote his upcoming film, De De Pyaar Dey. The movie is slated to release on May 17, 2019.
